extractions.description: This paper addresses the ethics of multimodal AI systems, especially those incorporating both text and images. It discusses creating an ethical multimodal dataset, evaluating a specific model (MAGMA), and developing algorithms to automate the ethical assessment of AI system responses.

type.justification: The paper involves the creation of a dataset and the empirical evaluation of algorithms to assess ethicality in multimodal AI systems.
type.quote: Then, using this database, we develop algorithms, including a RoBERTalarge classifier and a multilayer perceptron, to automatically assess the ethicality of system responses.
